Message:
At the cost of obtaining
the power I desired,
the entire kingdom was left
scarred beyond remedy.

Inside the castle that
no longer existed, in the room
where the throne once stood,
I softly placed the tip of
Executioner at my throat—

She will never forgive me
if I were to take my own life.

“If you cannot die,
then give in to your madness.”

The crystals that surround me
whisper in a voice strikingly
similar to Queen Amleth’s.

“Will you stay by my side?
Always...and forever...?”

Aah... Stop...
Do not speak in her voice...!

Until Queen Amleth...
punishes me for what
I have done...!

I beg you, Queen Amleth...
Please...fulfill your promise...
